mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS id, p.post_image_url AS post_image_url, u.user_name AS user_name, u.profile_image_url AS profile_image_url, u.account_id AS account_id FROM posts p LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id = p.user_id ORDER BY p.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset};

SELECT p.post_image_url AS post_image_url, i.image_url AS item_image_url, i.brand_name AS brand_name, p.description AS description, COUNT(b.post_id) AS bookmark_count, u.profile_image_url AS profile_image_url, u.user_name AS user_name FROM posts p INNER JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN items i ON p.id = i.post_id LEFT JOIN bookmark b ON b.post_id = p.id WHERE p.id = #{postId}
